metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17126 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The load_debug_section function in readelf.c in GNU Binutils 2.29.1 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory access andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via an ELFfile that lacks section headers.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
